1 #include "lib/uav_optimal_coverage.h"
2 
3 uav_optimal_coverage::uav_optimal_coverage (double altitude) : pos(altitude)
4 {
5  NodeHandle nh;
6 
7  // init state of algorithm
8  state = STATE_ACTIVE;
9 
10  // read parameters
11  int queue_size;
12  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
13 
14  // publishers, subscribers, and service clients
15  wp_getter = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint>("coverage_path/waypoint");
16  wp_getter.waitForExistence();
17 
18  // get initial waypoint of path
19  get_wp.request.position = pos.get_pose().position;
20  get_wp.request.tolerance = pos.get_tolerance();
21  if (wp_getter.call(get_wp) == false || get_wp.response.valid == false){
22  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get waypoint, cannot perform coverage!");
23  state = STATE_ABORTED;
24  return;
25  }
26  waypoint = get_wp.response.point;
27  ROS_INFO("Initial waypoint [%.2f, %.2f]", waypoint.x, waypoint.y);
28 }
29 
30 uav_optimal_coverage::~uav_optimal_coverage ()
31 {
32 }
33 
34 behavior_state_t uav_optimal_coverage::step ()
35 {
36  // update position information
37  spinOnce();
38 
39  if (state == STATE_ACTIVE) {
40  // reached current waypoint of path
41  if (pos.reached()) {
42  // get next waypoint of path
43  get_wp.request.position = pos.get_pose().position;
44  get_wp.request.tolerance = pos.get_tolerance();
45  if (wp_getter.call(get_wp) == false) {
46  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get waypoint, cannot perform coverage!");
47  return STATE_ABORTED;
48  }
49 
50  // finished path
51  if (get_wp.response.valid == false) {
52  ROS_INFO("Path completely traversed, stop coverage!");
53  return STATE_ABORTED;
54  }
55 
56  waypoint = get_wp.response.point;
57  ROS_INFO("Move to waypoint [%.2f, %.2f]", waypoint.x, waypoint.y);
58  }
59 
60  // convert waypoint to pose
61  geometry_msgs::Pose goal = pos.get_pose();
62  goal.position.x = waypoint.x;
63  goal.position.y = waypoint.y;
64 
65  // move to new position
66  if (pos.move(goal) == false)
67  state = STATE_ABORTED;
68  }
69 
70  // return state to action server
71  return state;
72 }
73 
74 void uav_optimal_coverage::stop ()
75 {
76  pos.stop();
77 }
